bioconda.name: fastani
bioconda.summary: FastANI is developed for fast alignment-free computation of whole-genome Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI).

biocontainers.name: fastani
biocontainers.summary: FastANI is developed for fast alignment-free computation of whole-genome Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI).

biotools.summary: FastANI is developed for fast alignment-free computation of whole-genome Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI). ANI is defined as mean nucleotide identity of orthologous gene pairs shared between two microbial genomes. FastANI supports pairwise comparison of both complete and draft genome assemblies.

galaxy.summary: Fast alignment-free computation of whole-genome Average Nucleotide Identity
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: FastANI is developed for fast alignment-free computation of whole-genome Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI). ANI is defined as mean nucleotide identity of orthologous gene pairs shared between two microbial genomes. FastANI supports pairwise comparison of both complete and draft genome assemblies.
